subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Allen Iverson scored 39 points last night, including a driving layup with 2.2 seconds remaining, to lead the Philadelphia 76ers to a 105-103 victory over the Orlando Magic.
snippet: Allen Iverson scored 39 points last night, including a driving layup with 2.2 seconds remaining, to lead the Philadelphia 76ers to a 105-103 victory over the Orlando Magic.
